title: single_meal_cabbage_and_minced_pork
summary: A single meal prepared and consumed by the system builder using cooked minced pork and Chinese cabbage.
description: Chinese cabbage stir-fried with minced pork, served with rice, consumed as the only meal of the day by the system builder. This meal references previously cooked minced pork prepared under energy constraints (Data Unit 00058). The record reflects minimal resource consumption and sustenance during system-building activities.

external_reference.note: External reference is provided for verification convenience only and does not serve as a primary anchor.
